```{r}
library(xtable)
use<-c("no","no", "yes","yes")
per<-c("no","yes","no","yes")
n<-c(265,148,75,22)
data21 <- data.frame(use,per,n)

data21$use <- as.factor(data21$use)
data21$per <- as.factor(data21$per)
model21<-glm(per~use, weights =n, family = binomial(link=logit), data=data21)

```
